text: “Bala Abaleevi bonna mu mpya zaabwe ne mu bika byabwe3:15 Abaleevi tebaawandikibwanga kulwana mu magye, era kyebaava batabalibwa oluvannyuma lw’emyaka amakumi abiri egy’obukulu. Ekya babazanga, kwe kumanya abaana baabwe ababereberye (3:40-43).. Bala buli mwana mulenzi ow’omwezi ogumu n’okusingawo.”
